name: The Dreamscape (Isa730)
description:
In The Dreamscape, you’re a data analyst wishing to escape their personal corporate hell by pursuing a career in visual arts. What’s stopping you, however, is a crippling fear of failure and rejection by those looking down on you for giving up a lucrative career in exchange for “childish” dreams. While asleep, fight off personifications of your insecurities and inspire yourself to choose happiness.

Please play using a controller!
